OrgName.entry: SEXUAL HEALTH DROP-IN FOR GAY AND BISEXUAL MEN

Desc.entry: A city centre drop-in clinic designed to provide a safe and confidential place where gay and bisexual men can be tested for sexually transmitted infections and receive Hepatitis B vaccinations. Trained nurses and health promotion staff will be available to offer advice and information regarding male sexual health. Free condoms and lube available to all clients. Run by Sheffield Contraception and Sexual Health Service (SCaSH).
